person.persName: John J. Herdt (Jefferson County, Kentucky, tinner )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, tinner. Native of Germany. Married to Anna Grearer Herdt. Father of Margaret Herdt Vogel, Eliza Herdt, John A. Herdt, Emery Herdt, and Eliza Herdt. Tinner in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860.
